items.sentence: Tom crushed the sheet of paper up into a ball and threw it across the room.
Tom felt that it would be a waste of time to translate the letter for Mary.
Tom gave Mary a box of chocolates, and then ate all the chocolates himself.
Tom took the framed photo off the mantelpiece and took a closer look at it.
Tom writes something in his diary every evening, no matter how tired he is.
We waited for the bus, but it was over 30 minutes late, so we caught a cab.
When Tom ate some food that had fallen on the floor, Mary looked disgusted.
Mary is a very beautiful woman. On a scale of one to ten, she\'s an eleven.
Tom and Mary weren\'t able to eat the spicy food that John made for dinner.
I thought chances of Tom not noticing what Mary was doing were pretty slim.
